statements: DELETE FROM waste_management_events WHERE event_type = 'Community Clean-up';
DELETE FROM waste_management_events WHERE event_type = 'Community Clean-up' AND event_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM clean_up_initiatives WHERE initiative_id = 25 AND initiative_date = '2022-07-15';
DELETE FROM waste_collection_events WHERE event_location = 'City Park' AND event_time < '12:00:00';
DELETE FROM Organizers WHERE organization_name = 'Green Earth';
DELETE FROM cleanup_initiatives WHERE lead_organization = 'XYZ Corp';
